Subbed Projects.Show Name: Crayon Shin-chan Manatsu no Yoru ni Ora Sanjou! Arashi wo Yobu Den-O vs. Shin-O 60-bu Special!!
Kamen Rider SD Kaiki?! Kumo Otoko

Good Comments: Very good subbing as EJ always does.Great Opening and Ending karaoke too!
Bad Comments: Even for an inexperienced team with the occasional help from  a few TVN and TokuPlex staff, and how each project is done by one person alone, they do a pretty good job for beginners.  Not to be biased but we're a good group overall :D
